abstract.para: Individual memberships are available for individuals within organizations or independent of organizations.

formalpara.title: Professional Plus
formalpara.para: Professional Plus members are individuals from either the corporate or government sector who would like to be instrumental in the founding of the Swarm Development Group.

formalpara.title: Individual Corporate
formalpara.para: Individual Corporate members are individuals working in the corporate sector.

formalpara.title: Individual Government
formalpara.para: Individual Government members are individuals working for a government agency.

formalpara.title: Academic Plus
formalpara.para: Academic Plus members are individuals from a university who would like to be instrumental in the founding of the Swarm Development Group.

formalpara.title: Individual University
formalpara.para: Individual University members are individuals representing universities.

formalpara.title: Postdoc
formalpara.para: Postdoc members are individuals who have received their doctorate degree and are currently working in industry or academia as a postdoc.

formalpara.title: Student
formalpara.para: Student members are undergraduate and graduate students at a university.
